title: Clinical Reasoning Workshop for Interprofessional Healthcare Collaboration

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational medical knowledge and clinical case analysis experience
context.additional_context: Online asynchronous course for medical/physical therapy students to enhance clinical reasoning skills through team-based collaboration

learning_goals: Learners can analyze clinical cases from diverse professional perspectives and collaboratively develop diagnostic plans
Learners can apply role distribution and communication strategies with interdisciplinary experts to real-world cases
Learners can evaluate team collaboration and reasoning processes through project-based clinical reports.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
